title: Lessons learned on the feasibility of coastal wetland restoration for blue carbon and co-benefits in Australia

Author(s): Valerie Hagger, Phoebe Stewart-Sinclair, Renee Anne Rossini, Maria Fernanda Adame, William Glamore, Paul Lavery, Nathan J. Waltham, Catherine E. Lovelock
